list.label: Metric
list.name: metric
list.query: MAE : mae, CRPS : crps, RMSE : rmse, ACC : acc, Bias : bias

list.definition:
select 
forecast as __value,
case
 when forecast = 'salient' then 'Salient' 
when forecast = 'climatology_2015' then 'Clim 1985-2015' 
when forecast = 'climatology_trend_2015' then 'Clim + Trend' 
when forecast = 'climatology_rolling' then 'Clim Rolling' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er' then 'ECMWF IFS ER' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er_debiased' then 'ECMWF IFS ER Debiased' 
 else forecast
end as __text
from "${precip_tab_name_baseline}" where week1 is not null and forecast != 'salient'
list.label: Baseline
list.name: baseline
list.query:
select 
forecast as __value,
case
 when forecast = 'salient' then 'Salient' 
when forecast = 'climatology_2015' then 'Clim 1985-2015' 
when forecast = 'climatology_trend_2015' then 'Clim + Trend' 
when forecast = 'climatology_rolling' then 'Clim Rolling' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er' then 'ECMWF IFS ER' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er_debiased' then 'ECMWF IFS ER Debiased' 
 else forecast
end as __text
from "${precip_tab_name_baseline}" where week1 is not null and forecast != 'salient'

list.label: Region
list.name: region
list.query: Africa : africa, East Africa : east_africa, Global : global, CONUS : conus

list.label: Time Grouping
list.name: time_grouping
list.query: None : None, Month of Year : month_of_year, Year : year

list.definition:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN 'select v.* from (values (''None'')) v(t)'
    ELSE 'select distinct time from "${precip_tab_name}"'
END
from (values ('$time_grouping')) v(g)
list.name: time_filter_filter_query
list.query:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN 'select v.* from (values (''None'')) v(t)'
    ELSE 'select distinct time from "${precip_tab_name}"'
END
from (values ('$time_grouping')) v(g)

list.definition:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN ''
    ELSE 'where time = ' || v.t
END
from (values ('$time_filter', '$time_grouping')) v(t, g)
list.name: time_filter_query
list.query:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN ''
    ELSE 'where time = ' || v.t
END
from (values ('$time_filter', '$time_grouping')) v(t, g)
